statements: DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001 AND transaction_type = 'Buy';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE sale_amount > 500 AND cryptocurrency = 'Bitcoin';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM wallets WHERE balance < 0.00 AND currency_id = (SELECT currency_id FROM currencies WHERE currency_name = 'USD')
DELETE FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy' AND amount < 100;
DELETE FROM wallets WHERE balance < 100.00 AND last_transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
